metadata.name: Class of 2022
metadata.description:
Paying homage to the projects and 1/1 artists that inspired me throughout 2022 in this action-packed class photo.

In a year where it seemed that we were all struggling to survive in a difficult market, I wanted to create something that would serve as a reminder of the passion and drive that brought us all here. This piece is a celebration of the enduring power of art to uplift and inspire us, even in the darkest of times. 

The best way I can show love and say thank you is through my art. Happy 2023.
